评论概述: Inconsistent Fit & The “FASHION” Logo on the Front
评论详情: I purchased this hoodie for my wife to wear during a Breast Cancer Awareness Run, hoping it would keep her warm yet comfortable for a day that involved both outdoor exposure and physical activity. While the hoodie has its strong points, there were a few issues we encountered.  The hoodie feels substantial and offers solid warmth, comparable to a Hanes Heavyweight hoodie. The fabric is a blend of 60% cotton and 40% polyester, which provides a good balance of softness and durability. It’s ideal for cooler weather and offers that cozy, comfortable feel you want in an oversized sweatshirt, making it a good buy for the price. The oversized fit gives it a relaxed, stylish look, making it perfect for casual outings, runs, or layering over workout clothes. The front pocket is a nice touch, offering both a convenient space for essentials and a bit of extra warmth for the hands. The hoodie’s overall design is trendy and would look great paired with leggings or jeans, just how my wife prefers.  Although the oversized style is a plus for many, the fit can be somewhat tricky. My wife found it wasn’t quite right for her body type—it looked too boxy, and the sleeves were a bit too long, making it uncomfortable for active movement. Sizing down might help, but it would be great if the fit was more adjustable to accommodate different body shapes better. While the hoodie’s look is generally appealing, the “FASHION” logo on the front feels unnecessary and a bit distracting. A plain, logo-free design would be more versatile, especially for those who prefer a cleaner look or are buying this for events or athletic activities. The logo limits the hoodie’s appeal for those looking for a simple, classic sweatshirt.  For the price, this PRETTYGARDEN hoodie is a decent choice, especially if you’re looking for an affordable, warm, and stylish option. The fabric quality is good, and the oversized style is trendy and cozy. However, I would recommend double-checking the sizing and keeping in mind the prominent logo. I ended up returning this hoodie due to fit issues (plus there was not enough time to get a replacement in time for the Run), but I may consider reordering in a different size later on. For anyone looking for a budget-friendly oversized hoodie with warmth and a trendy look, this might still be worth a try.

评论概述: True to Size | Comfortable | Great Value
评论详情: I ordered this Fashion hoodie in a size XL, I typically wear a large but am currently 8 months along (and I prefer my hoodies oversized anyway). It fit as expected and is quite comfortable. I was pretty surprised given that it's only $14.99, but I guess every now and then you find a good deal that doesn't have low quality materials. It appears to be well made - no stray strings to note, and its held up well thus far thankfully. The sewn in FASHION wording isn't done perfectly, but I actually like that about it. Especially since I feel fashion is all about how you perceive it to be, much like art. Overall Nice.

Green hoodie "fashion" - The color and the weight of this hoodie are amazing. It has an oversized hood which is nice, but without drawstrings, it is a bit unmanageable. The embroidered "Fashion" ruined it for me. I wouldn't choose to wear it in public because of that, but for around the house it works.

I like the xPRETTYGARDEN Womens Long Sleeve Hoodie and I have many things from this brand on here. The color and oversizing is accurate. It obviously runs large as it is to be worn big, so true to size or one size down if you hope to have it fit slightly tighter. My only issue is that the neck hole is bulky and small and the sweatshirt material only has but so much soft stretch, so it's not terrible cozy, but it is cute. The word FASHION seems weird, but I kind of think it's cute to wear around and shrug when people ask. Ha!
I absolutely love this hoodie. One of the most comfortable hoodies I've ever worn. Great quality fabric. Love the color, fit. All winter long I will be in this hoodie.

评论概述: Good hoodie for a chilly night
评论详情: I ordered the blue hoodie in XL. The color is great and true to the picture.  I usually wear a large, but wanted more room to wear shirts and long johns underneath.  The actual hood is unique, it is stitched around the edge of it and it gives it a bit more stability. It it works well.  The neck does not choke me out either - I hate things that are tighter around the neck and some of the hoodies I have worn have been tight around the neck if they didn't have a zipper,, but this sweatshirt is not tight at all around the neck.  It is 60% cotton and 40% polyester.  Typically that makes it not shrink too much, but I am hoping it will shrink slightly and soften up a bit.  I don't care for the word "FASHION" on it but I am going to take that out and have a friend of mine sew something else in that are.  I like this sweatshirt/hoodie and absolutely love the color.
Super comfy and soft hoodie. I've loved every item I've ever ordered from this brand. Size up for the oversized baggie look.
